import React from 'react'; import HowToPlaySubtitle from './HowToPlaySubtitle.js'; import { EventGoalCard } from '../../Footer/EventGoalCard.js'; import { MemberCard } from '../../Footer/MemberCard.js'; import { HelpCircle, Gift, Repeat } from 'react-feather'; import '../../../css/about.css'; const Guesswho = (props) => { return (

Step 1

Every player is given a random Member Card.

Step 2

Take turns asking a single yes / no question about your assigned Member.

Step 3

Whoever correctly guesses their Member wins and earns a point!

Step 4

Repeat from Step 1 until bored.

); } export default Guesswho;
